Phylogenetic analysis based on 16S rRNA gene sequences has placed B. aydinogluensis within the genus Brevibacillus, which is a member of the Bacillaceae family. This species exhibits several unique biochemical and physiological characteristics that distinguish it from other Brevibacillus species, making it a distinct member of the genus. Further research may reveal additional insights into the ecology, potential applications, and overall significance of B. aydinogluensis in the natural environment.
